question: What are the current IT budget trends and technology focus areas for companies in the finance industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the finance industry and retrieve their IT budget data.
Gather data on technology focus areas for identified finance companies to analyze their strategic priorities.
Analyze and summarize trends in IT budgets and focus areas over the last few years for these companies.
Cross-reference the IT budget data with company deal records to evaluate technology spending versus contract values.
